detect_objects.name: Detect Objects
detect_objects.description: Detect objects, scenes, or other features in images using VK Cloud Vision API and optionally save processed images with bounding boxes.

modes.name: Detection Modes
modes.description: Select one or more detection modes to apply. Defaults to "multiobject" if not specified.

file_out.name: Output File Path
file_out.description: Template for path to save processed image with bounding boxes.

entity_id.name: Camera Entity
entity_id.description: Camera entity to capture image from for object detection.
